reg_info.act_under: Abandoned Orchards Act   Loi sur les vergers abandonnés

content.content: 1. (1) A certificate designating an orchard as a neglected orchard shall be in Form 1. (2) A revocation of a certificate in Form 1 shall be in Form2. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 1, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. (1) A certificate designating an orchard as a neglected orchard shall be in Form 1.

(2) A revocation of a certificate in Form 1 shall be in Form2. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 1, s. 1.

content.content: 2. The following trees, shrubs or vines are designated for the purposes of clause 8 (b) of the Act: 1. Hawthorn. 2. Wild plum. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 1, s. 2. FORM 1 Abandoned Orchards Act CERTIFICATE   R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 1, Form 1. FORM 2 Abandoned Orchards Act   R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 1, Form 2.
content.raw_html:
2. The following trees, shrubs or vines are designated for the purposes of clause 8 (b) of the Act:

1. Hawthorn.

2. Wild plum.

R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 1, s. 2.

FORM 1

Abandoned Orchards Act

CERTIFICATE


R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 1, Form 1.

FORM 2

Abandoned Orchards Act


R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 1, Form 2.
